verbs.description: [ARG1: Trump attorney Emmet Flood and White House chief of staff John Kelly] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: came] [ARG4: to a portion of the two intelligence briefings] , [ARGM-ADV: angering the top Democrats on the intel committees in the House and Senate]
